intent_atoms.description: Integrate FoundationUI dependency into the project and ensure it builds successfully.
FoundationUI dependency is added and project compiles without errors.
All integration tests must pass (123 tests) before moving to next phase.
Create a comprehensive integration test suite for FoundationUI components.
Integration test suite contains 123 tests covering Badge, Card, KeyValueRow, and Integration components.
Test coverage must be ≥80% after Phase 0.
Build a component showcase using ComponentTestApp to display all FoundationUI components.
ComponentTestApp shows at least 14 screens with live components.
Document integration patterns and design system guide updates.
Documentation includes a migration path, quality gates for each of six phases, and accessibility requirements ≥98% WCAG 2.1 AA.
Use DS.Badge for all badge components instead of custom implementations.
